description_text:
Can I use the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for
Vibration Feedback on any pedals

conversations.body_text: Hi Nicholas D’Ambrosio,    Are you looking to make a purchase? Other pedal brands may require different mounting brackets, but they must be used with our control box to collect telemetry data and perform the vibration feedback.

I was asking because I own a fantec pedal set and I plan on using Sim hub
for the telemetry dont want to buy now just had questions

On Wed, Jul 30, 2025, 6:59 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Nicholas D’Ambrosio,   The Fanatec control unit does not feature a bidirectional motor control chip. Therefore, our PlusX control unit is required to work with the VAM Pro and ensure compatibility with SimHub 9.9.3.
